subject: started a new note in my notes app
body:
[this really beautiful thank you note mel wrote](https://substack.com/home/post/p-152376753)

![IMG_1162.jpg](/letters/images/85.jpg)

deborah enjoyed a persimmon and i posted some of my most recent things reasonable people love that i hate to my stories (items added since i last shared with you: `burrata, non-alcoholic beer, "hottogo" by chappel roan, music that could be described as "anthemic", rice in soup, basically any piece of art that people talk about restoring their faith in humanity, Christmas culture, persimmon`) and hannah asked if there's an inverse of that list, which is things i love that reasonable people hate, and she shared a really good one of hers, which was airplane meals, and i started a new note in my notes app so far i've got: `mouthwash, 2+ hour walks, neti pot`

![IMG_1163.jpg](/letters/images/84.jpg)

my dad received the foot/calf massager i sent him for christmas, which i thought had been lost to package thieves
